C

CACertificate - Class in be.belgium.eid.security
This class contains the Certificate Authority certificate which is a certificate for verifying data on a smart card.
CACertificate(SmartCard) - Constructor for class be.belgium.eid.security.CACertificate
Initializes the CA certificate by reading the data from the given card reader.
CACertificate(byte[]) - Constructor for class be.belgium.eid.security.CACertificate
Initializes the CA certificate by the given data.
CardAdapter - Class in be.belgium.eid.event
The adapter class for the card listener.
CardAdapter() - Constructor for class be.belgium.eid.event.CardAdapter
 
CardAlivePromptTask - Class in be.belgium.eid.event
This class prompts the card reader to check whether the card is alive.
CardAlivePromptTask(SmartCard, CardListener) - Constructor for class be.belgium.eid.event.CardAlivePromptTask
Initializes the task with the given card reader.
cardInserted() - Method in class be.belgium.eid.event.CardAdapter
 
cardInserted() - Method in interface be.belgium.eid.event.CardListener
When a card is inserted this event is triggered.
CardListener - Interface in be.belgium.eid.event
The card listener records when the smart card is inserted or removed to/from the smart card reader connected.
CardNotFoundException - Exception in be.belgium.eid.exceptions
The "card not found" exception indicates that the card with which the connection is to be made is not present in the card reader.
CardNotFoundException(CardNotFoundException.CardNotFoundType) - Constructor for exception be.belgium.eid.exceptions.CardNotFoundException
Initializes the card not found exception with the given type.
CardNotFoundException(Throwable, CardNotFoundException.CardNotFoundType) - Constructor for exception be.belgium.eid.exceptions.CardNotFoundException
Initializes the card not found exception with the given type and the given cause of the problem.
CardNotFoundException.CardNotFoundType - Enum in be.belgium.eid.exceptions
Contains the types of card not found exception
cardRemoved() - Method in class be.belgium.eid.event.CardAdapter
 
cardRemoved() - Method in interface be.belgium.eid.event.CardListener
When a card is removed this event is triggered.
Certificate - Class in be.belgium.eid.security
The certificate class is an abstract class for the different kinds of certificates stored on the smart card.
Certificate(byte[], String) - Constructor for class be.belgium.eid.security.Certificate
Initializes the certificate with the given contents and identification.
CertificateChain - Class in be.belgium.eid.security
The certificate chain class represents the chain of certificates that are to be verified to verify the data on a certain smart card.
CertificateChain(SmartCard) - Constructor for class be.belgium.eid.security.CertificateChain
Initializes the certificate chain by reading all the certificates in the chain from the smart card and to verify them.
CertificateChain(RootCertificate, CACertificate, AuthenticationCertificate, SignatureCertificate) - Constructor for class be.belgium.eid.security.CertificateChain
Initializes the certificate chain by filling the data with existing certificates.
CertificateStatus - Enum in be.belgium.eid.security
Contains the different states that can occur when validating a certificate.
changePIN(String, String) - Method in class be.belgium.eid.eidlib.SmartCard
Changes the PIN code of the PIN.
connect() - Method in class be.belgium.eid.eidlib.BeID
Connects the smart card to the system if possible.
connectCard(String) - Method in class be.belgium.eid.eidlib.SmartCard
Connects the system to the smart card reader with the given name to allow operations to be performed on the smart card.
connectCard() - Method in class be.belgium.eid.eidlib.SmartCard
Connects the system to the first compatible smart card reader to allow operations to be performed on the smart card.
